description: You've gained a ability to jump from an standing position, this does not go very far.
You've gained a ability to jump from a standing position, this covers quite the distance.
You've gained a ability to not only leap from a standing position, you can now snatch prey by jumping too.
You've gained a ability to leap an extremely long distance due your lightweight body.
Smash into the nearest enemy or dash through a gap.
Obstacles don't slow you down that much anymore.
Your brain has adapted to cluttered enviroments, furniture and other obstacles barely slow you down.

Your paws are much larger now.  Manual dexterity is difficult: permanent hand encumbrance of 20, serious problems crafting, and no gloves.  In return, though, you can swim better, deal bonus bash damage and perform a smacking attack. Activate to dig and pry.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: You have claws on the ends of your fingers, and can extend or retract them as desired.  Gloves will still get in the way, though.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: Your paws are bone, muscle, and claw with a thin layer of skin and fur.  They might as well be made of stainless steel.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: You're just generally quick!  You get a 10% bonus to action points.
20% Action point bonus! Damn.
You have a high tolerance for pain.
Just like birds of prey, are very good at carrying big loads relative to your build. 50% carry weight increase!
If you are in a very dangerous situation, you may experience a temporary rush which increases your speed and strength significantly.
You need less sleep than the average person.
Your body produces a potent venom.  Cutting or stabbing attacks from mutations have a chance to poison your target.
Your venom has become particularly strong.  You're confident that your bites or other cutting/stabbing natural attacks will take your target down quickly.
Your flesh is highly poisonous, and creatures that bite you will receive a nasty surprise.
You have fast reflexes, allowing you to dodge attacks more easily.
Pecking at prey is part of your daily routine now.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

attacks.attack_text_u: You jackhammer into %s with your beak

description: You've grown an extra pair of ursine ears.  You can hear things a little farther away.
You've grown an extra pair of feline ears.  You find it easier to tune in on sounds from afar.  They are also very fluffy!
Your hearing has evolved further and is now on par with that of wolves.  You can hear things significantly farther away.
You have undergone a series of adaptations that make you a better swimmer, swimming is also a little more enjoable now.
You can manage to find space for anything!  You can carry 40% more volume.
Your attacks are 10% faster overall.  You are also better at recovering from a miss, and will be able to attempt another strike faster.
Your attacks are 20% faster overall, OOOOoooo.  You are also better at recovering from a miss, and will be able to attempt another strike faster.
You got a little something from your arachnid cousins, you can now do a piercing attack.
You have acquired some physiological characteristics of honey-producing insects, activate to make honey.
Your Body contains maple syrup, activate to get some of it.

spawn_item.message: This hurts, at least you got some syrup.

description: Your tail and/or fangs contain a powerful acid, activate to obtain some of it.

spawn_item.message: You squeeze a little bit of acid out of your stinger.

description: You develop a reservoir of fluids that bulges out of your abdomen.  Your body has adapted to containing extra liquids in event of shortfalls.
You have devolphed a growth similar to a insect abdomen, it contains lots of usable liquid, but blocks non-fabric pants.
Your abdomen now has a stinger, you can make piercing attacks with it.
Your jaw and nose have extended into a bearish muzzle.  You could bite with it, and it looks impressive, but it prevents wearing mouthgear.
You find it difficult not to sink roots when able.  You extract nutrients and water whenever on diggable terrain, but move more slowly, these spread roots also allow you to slow your enemies down.
You have full control of your vines, and can grow new ones and detach old ones more or less at will.

spawn_item.message: You detach a vine from your body.

description: Loose powdery scales lie on your skin, release them into enemies to cause slowdown and damage.
You've become... furred, release them into enemies to cause slowdown and damage.
A set of insect-like mandibles have grown around your mouth.  They allow you to eat faster and provide a slicing unarmed attack, but prevent wearing mouthwear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

spawn_item.message: You squeeze a little bit of acid out.

description: Your skin can change color and texture, activate to dissapear.
You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils. Cosmetic.
You can constrict your veins to stop bleeding.
You have devolphed a salt gland, allowing you to expel excess salt.

spawn_item.message: You weren't gonna use this stuff anyways.

description: You have a chamber of pressurized acid in your body, activate to release a poweful stream of acid.

Whether due to exercise and good diet, or due to a natural propensity to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much less readily than others.  Your maximum stamina and stamina regeneration is 25% higher than usual.
You are less likely to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.  If you throw up despite this, you won't suffer any residual nausea.
You can handle intoxicants well.  Their effects clear up more quickly for you.
Whether due to a lifetime of exposure or through simple willpower, it's harder for you to become addicted to substances, and easier to rid yourself of these addictions.
You have a set of clear lenses which lower over your eyes while underwater or underground, allowing you to see as though you were wearing goggles. Decreases wet penalties.

A set of heavy green scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  While difficult to penetrate, it also limits your flexibility, resulting in a -1 penalty to Dexterity.  Greatly reduces wet effects.
A set of very flexible and slick scales has grown to cover your body.  These act as weak natural armor, improve your ability to swim, and make you difficult to grab.  Mostly reduces wet effects.

You have Avian Bone Syndrome--your bones are nearly hollow.  Your body is very light as a result, enabling you to move and attack 20% faster, but also frail; you can carry 30% less, and bashing attacks injure you more.
You have a major digestive disorder.  Though it causes you to vomit frequently, you have found that you can trigger your vomit reflex on demand, too.

Your mind and brain have adapted to your new place in the world: as one on top of the food chain.  You can effortlessly master and maintain combat skills, but your critical thinking has atrophied further.
Your tongue has become a sort of spear, activate to do a projectile attack.
The hairless apes make as good eating as any other meat.
You recover from pain slightly faster than normal.
You sometimes look back on your days before your tail came in.  But you're better now.
//: Based on highest of category's iv_hunger, iv_thirst, or iv_fatigue.  Most default to 10+10+5 so default value of 10

description: You're sure you'll fly someday.  In the meantime, there are still nests to build.
Ninety percent of the planet, and it's yours to explore.  And colonize.  And enjoy.  What was that about a surface?
It's about time you grew out.  Now that you've matured, it is time to make something of yourself.
Stalking prey, eating well, and lying in the sun.  Mmm, all you could ever desire.
You're the perfect candidate to lead a pack.
So the humans died; what's the worry?  Now they won't ruin the woods.
Civilization collapsed?  Great!  You and your kin will never have to worry about a slaughterhouse again.
It would be good to be a Queen, having workers constantly servicing your every need… but how would you keep them in line?
Well, you still have those other walking flowers-and the mushrooms too-to deal with.  But you'll manage.
What was that old advertisement?  'Paint the planet'?  That might be a good long-term goal, but for now…
Not much point to rebuilding up in that horribly bright roofless wasteland.  Now that you've become accustomed to your new digs, there's the beginning of a great empire right here, underground.
Strange aeons, true, but Death seems to be slacking, and you are doing just fine.
Well, maybe you'll just have to make your own worldwide web.
Hey.  Civilization fell.  You're still around.  'Rat' just isn't respectful.
After all those experiments, what's a few more, hmm?
//: iv_fatigue of 5, other values are lower

description: You're the perfect candidate to tidy this mess.
//: iv_fatigue of 5, other values are lower

description: You are the tree under which humankind will shelter during these dark times.
You can't tell what you are anymore.  Everything and yet nothing, like you weren't meant to exist.  But you do, and you're a force, no matter what happens.
//: iv_hunger, iv_thirst, and iv_fatigue are all at 20

description: The chance to undo not one but TWO extinction events.  You're confident you'll do fine.
So much food, everywhere!  And nobody's even guarding it anymore!  These are good times.
You get the feeling that you're on the cusp of becoming something greater than yourself.
We are the Mycus.
Your scales have grown to form thick plates, besides the wet benefits, you get a suit of armor embeded under your skin.
You have a barbed tongue that can remove fur, activate to shear.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: Fishing is , activate to fish.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: Fishing is just like walking or chewing to you now, activate to fish.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.
Your jaw and nose have extended into a wolfish muzzle.  It lends itself to biting in combat and looks impressive, but prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your face and jaws are a shorter version of those found on alligators.  They look NASTY--as do the bite wounds they can inflict--but prevent wearing mouthgear.

attacks.attack_text_u: You bite a chunk out of %s

description: You have a beak for a mouth.  You can occasionally use it to peck at your enemies, but it is impossible for you to wear mouth gear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

Your teeth have grown incredibly sharp, and have calcified even further.  In addition to letting you eat much faster, you can use them as a lethal natural weapon, as long as your anatomy favors it.  They also grow very fast, and you harmlessly shed them more or less at random.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your teeth

description: Your fangs have grown extremely large and incredibly sharp.  They make it impossible to wear mouthgear and difficult to eat… but leave nasty wounds when you bite.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your saber teeth
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s tears into %2$s with their saber teeth

description: Your mammalian lips allow you to pressurize inflatable objects.

spawn_item.message: You prepare youself for the activity.

description: Your muscle response is dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 5 (2.8) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).  This sluggishness helps you conserve energy, however.
Your muscle response is highly dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 3 (1.7) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C), but your slow metabolism requires much less food.
You are cold-blooded and rely on heat to keep moving.  Your lose 1% of your speed for every 2 (1.1) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C), but only need to eat about half as much as before.
Your body has become permanently cold-blooded.  Your speed lowers or raises 1% for every 2 (1.1) degrees below or above 65 F (18.3 C).  You only need to eat half as much as an average human.
Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables, grains and nuts is reduced, eating meat is the better choice.
Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables, grains and nuts is severely hampered.  You cannot eat anything besides meat.

You've noticeably shrunk in size.  You're able to move with increased litheness, but your smaller stature prevents you from carrying as much. Your reduced mass slightly reduces damage taken from falls.
You can deny it no longer!  You are small.  You've adapted to your new size, suffering a bit less from your reduced carry capacity and increased fragility.

You're only half as tall as you used to be!  The weight of things you once found easy to carry is now unbearable, clothes are now twice as encumbering for you unless you refit them (since you're half their size), and your hit points are heavily reduced.  However, your movement is silent, and your dodge skill is a little higher. Falling seems much less dangerous than before
You've mastered your tiny form!  Item encumbrance and carry weight penalties are reduced, and you've learned to use your increased nimbleness to offset your reduced capacity to absorb damage.
You derive enjoyment from killing things.  Putting end to life seem to spark some dark satisfaction and thrill, and you crave it every moment.
Your legs have gained muscle mass to propel you across any terrain, and help carry a bit more.
Your skin is rather pale.
Your capacity for travel is increased, terrain is now less bothersome.
You lack skin pigmentation due to a genetic problem.  You sunburn extremely easily, and typically use an umbrella and sunglasses when going out in the sun.
Your skin is tough.  Armor is increased by 2 for your whole body.  There's a small chance you don't cut yourself on sharp terrain.
You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a lizard-like appearance.

Your arms have grown vibrantly-colored feathers.  They effectively waterproof your arms and provide 1 point of bashing armor, but they get in the way a little.  They're simply too small to help you in the air.
